front.div:
Creating sophisticated and functional forms to add to your Web pages is easy with HoTMetaL PRO's powerful form editing
features. With our WYSIWYG form objects, tedious tasks can be completed in record time. Helpful dialogs take the mystery
out of forms creation, with easy to understand terminology and toolbar buttons. HoTMetaL PRO 4.0 includes a selection of
CGI Scripts and sample forms to help you get started.
